channel.title: 508 hell - pvp 508
channel.description:
BEFORE ANYONE POSTS YOU MIGHT WANT TO READ THE CREDITS!!!
~~CREDITS~~
Leanbow12: 55% Espeon Base (who ever created that lol:P): 7% Me: 38%
Ok, heres some features,
Working pvp drops Working clan chat Working Following Working MultiPlayer and 1v1
Commands: ::kdr(tells you your kill/death/rate.) ::close (closes overlay) ::resetkdr(resets your kdr.) ::password (changed yours password) ::inventorprice (shows you how much your inventory is worth (expanded pvp drops just like runescape Big Grin) ::master (all skills 99 and combat 126 do ::lvl 23 23000000 for 99 summoning Big Grin) ::starter (doesnt work, go to quest tab and click recieve starter 500m) ::yell *yells over the server duhh* ::item id amount. (plain and simple, nothing to say.) ::sellitem id amount ::checkkills (checks ur kills ::players (shows how many players) ::clothes (change your clothes) ::hair (change your hair) ::switch 0 , regular, switch 1, ancients, switch 2, lunar. ::female ::male ::coords *shows your ur coords...* ::backup, makes a copy of your account incase you get reset ::checkprice item id amount thats all the player commands, admins can find out on yourself
PICTURES:
:home/starterarea:
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/971/54360289.png[/img]
PVP :
Working pvp drops Tongue
DOWNLOAD LINK : IF THIS FILE HOSTER DOES NOT WORK FOR YOU PLEASE CONTACT ME
Mediafire: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojz2dfmtyym
IDC IF YOU LEECH JUST GIVE ME CREDITS
more pics soon

item.title: 508 hell - pvp 508

item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

BEFORE ANYONE POSTS YOU MIGHT WANT TO READ THE CREDITS!!!

CREDITS

Leanbow12: 55%
Espeon Base (who ever created that lol:P): 7%
Me: 38%

Ok, heres some features,

Working pvp drops
Working clan chat
Working Following
Working MultiPlayer and 1v1

Commands:
::kdr(tells you your kill/death/rate.)
::close (closes overlay)
::resetkdr(resets your kdr.)
::password (changed yours password)
::inventorprice (shows you how much your inventory is worth (expanded pvp drops just like runescape Big Grin)
::master (all skills 99 and combat 126 do ::lvl 23 23000000 for 99 summoning Big Grin)
::starter (doesnt work, go to quest tab and click recieve starter 500m)
::yell yells over the server duhh
::item id amount. (plain and simple, nothing to say.)
::sellitem id amount
::checkkills (checks ur kills
::players (shows how many players)
::clothes (change your clothes)
::hair (change your hair)
::switch 0 , regular, switch 1, ancients, switch 2, lunar.
::female
::male
::coords shows your ur coords…
::backup, makes a copy of your account incase you get reset
::checkprice item id amount
thats all the player commands, admins can find out on yourself
